summary: The Capital for Beginning Farmers and Ranchers Act of 2025 proposes a pilot program to provide development loans and loan guarantees to beginning farmers and ranchers. These loans, with flexible repayment terms and favorable interest rates, aim to finance capital investments that benefit farming or ranching businesses for more than one year. The program will also offer comprehensive training and support to borrowers, focusing on farm management issues, and will be subject to ongoing evaluation and reporting.
